boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Happy Salmon is a simple, ultra-fast, very silly card game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are no turns. Players call out the action shown on their cards as fast as they can. When two players have a match, they celebrate by performing the action. Actions include the classic _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;High 5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, the unifying _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Pound It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, the frantic _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Switcheroo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, and the delightful and bizarre _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Happy Salmon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each time a player celebrates a match, they quickly discard a card. The first person to get rid of all their cards wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;FIN-tastically_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; unique and cute fish pouch makes Happy Salmon perfect to take to camp, vacation or if you are just traveling upstream._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;AWARDS_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2016 ASTRA Best Toy for Kids Winner_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2017 TOTY Game of the Year nominee_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: NORTH STAR GAMES (NSG600) Happy Salmon is the simple, fast-paced card game packed to the gills with high-fivin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;, fin-flappin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; foolishness. Actions including the classic _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;High 5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, the unifying _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Pound It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, the frantic _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Switcheroo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, and the delightful _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Happy Salmon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; will leave players doubled over in laughter. At 30 seconds to learn and 2 minutes to play, the whole family can jump right into the fun. The iconic pouch is perfect to bring along to parties, camp, or just traveling upstream. With so many mini-celebrations built into the play, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the happiest game ever!

English version. New, in shrink, mint condition. Payment via PAYPAL +2€ Shipping within germany 2,99€, worldwide 5,99€. Or if you live in Berlin pick it up at our weekly game night! When ordering additional games you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll only pay the actual shipping cost! All prices include VAT.
